sentences.sContent: Test scores vary from school to school.
The heights of the plants vary from 8 cm to 20 cm.
sentences.sCn: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.sContent: Medical treatment varies greatly from state to state.
sentences.sCn: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.sContent: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.sCn: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.sContent: She has tried different diets with varying degrees of success.
sentences.sCn: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.sContent: tests of varying levels of difficulty
...but actually the rules of gift-giving vary quite a lot...
...Cooking skills and dish ingredients vary a Io! in different regions of China...
...audiences vary in their interests and how much complexity they can comprehend...

exam.question: The hopes, goals, fears and desires ______ widely between men and women, between the rich and the poor.

answer.explain: 句意： 男人与女人之间， 富人与穷人之间， 他们的希望、 目标、 恐惧与渴望都有很大的区别。alter： 改变， 变化； shift： 替换， 转移， 改变， 转换； transfer： 转换。

phrases.pCn: 在……方面变化；在……方面有差异

words.tran: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
[数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
可变性，变化性；[生物][数] 变异性
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: if several things of the same type vary, they are all different from each other
